bug_report.summary: When registering, when choosing the date of birth of the user, it is possible to choose a nonexistent date

steps.step_4: Enter date of birth 31/02/1990 in the field

bug_report.actual_result: When entering a nonexistent date, validation is triggered. An error message appears.
bug_report.expected_result: When filling in the field with a non-existent date, validation is triggered, informing the user about entering the correct date.
